txid: fceec4d1ba21b6d9f468ea2e34312c56b6da6ead978cdf25869b705e1b395020
// https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Protocol_documentation#tx
02000000
0001	// flag If present, always 0001, and indicates the presence of witness data, field size(0 or 2)
04	// input count
// efd8f7523811e8ec523c0f8b640e213f3727b92c7b1dad34f979bbf36e5a577a
7a575a6ef3bb79f934ad1d7b2cb927373f210e648b0f3c52ece8113852f7d8ef
00000000
17	// len
16	// len
// 1字节：见证版本
// 2-40字节：BIP141定义的见证程序
// 当前状态见证版本为0， 20字节表示P2WPKH地址，32字节表示P2WSH地址
00	// segarated witness version (default 0)
14	// segraated witness address len(P2WPKH)
// 3C92Eng7iq3dp37HwDGddnpew2Jmgvmqnh 
// 05 729c55de8804182fa3100ae0a4e46770af36a4de a2669e2a
// scriptSig, P2WPKH nested in BIP16 P2SH
// bitcoin160(030e2b37091d910ea95df2d8c38aaee7153cedb4791ad5f77782aa6c02e476b1ac)
4bffa867df5846318f074116c0346754b61edefe
feffffff	// sequence，非ffffffff表示locktime无效
